channel.title: Five Suggestions, this is not a deception
channel.description:
I'm not good with titles, but I guess I'll list some suggestions that I've discussed on Discord.
1̶.̶ ̶T̶h̶e̶ ̶a̶b̶i̶l̶i̶t̶y̶ ̶(̶i̶n̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶f̶u̶t̶u̶r̶e̶ ̶o̶f̶ ̶c̶o̶u̶r̶s̶e̶,̶ ̶ ̶l̶i̶k̶e̶ ̶a̶f̶t̶e̶r̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶m̶a̶i̶n̶ ̶s̶t̶u̶f̶f̶ ̶a̶r̶e̶ ̶s̶q̶u̶a̶r̶e̶d̶ ̶a̶w̶a̶y̶)̶ ̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶w̶a̶l̶k̶ ̶a̶r̶o̶u̶n̶d̶ ̶r̶o̶o̶m̶s̶ ̶(̶n̶o̶t̶ ̶o̶p̶e̶n̶ ̶w̶o̶r̶l̶d̶,̶ ̶ ̶j̶u̶s̶t̶ ̶i̶n̶ ̶c̶e̶r̶t̶a̶i̶n̶ ̶r̶o̶o̶m̶s̶ ̶f̶o̶r̶ ̶f̶u̶n̶)̶,̶ ̶l̶i̶k̶e̶,̶ ̶ ̶i̶t̶ ̶l̶i̶m̶i̶t̶s̶ ̶y̶o̶u̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶o̶n̶e̶ ̶r̶o̶o̶m̶ ̶w̶h̶e̶r̶e̶ ̶e̶v̶e̶r̶y̶o̶n̶e̶ ̶i̶s̶ ̶i̶n̶,̶ ̶ ̶l̶i̶k̶e̶.̶ ̶ ̶T̶h̶e̶ ̶a̶b̶i̶l̶i̶t̶y̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶w̶a̶l̶k̶ ̶a̶r̶o̶u̶n̶d̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶t̶h̶r̶o̶n̶e̶ ̶r̶o̶o̶m̶ ̶o̶r̶ ̶s̶o̶m̶e̶t̶h̶i̶n̶g̶.̶ ̶ ̶I̶ ̶t̶h̶i̶n̶k̶ ̶@̶i̶4̶2̶-̶B̶o̶s̶l̶o̶f̶ ̶s̶a̶i̶d̶ ̶o̶n̶ ̶D̶i̶s̶c̶o̶r̶d̶ ̶t̶h̶i̶s̶ ̶s̶e̶e̶m̶s̶ ̶l̶i̶k̶e̶ ̶a̶ ̶g̶o̶o̶d̶ ̶i̶d̶e̶a̶.̶ ̶ _@Unoski pointed out that this is a stretch goal. "Free, at last" @55k._
2. (website related) implement a http://throne-of-lies.com/legal/privacy.html & http://throne-of-lies.com/legal/eula.html page.
3. Add the ability to link your Throne of Lies account to Discord (asked Xblade about this on Discord, he said that would be cool- and probably possible due to Discord's API).
4. Teemo easter eggs somewhere, because teemo is the best, right?
5. When at the table, maybe we could kind of slide a book across the table to the king? I'm not sure, I feel this could work well, like- "Only for the Kings eyes", and then we'd slide a book across the long table with notes in it. Or something.
Anyways, those are 5 suggestions of possible features I think would be cool. I'm not the best with grammar though, and I am sorry for that.

item.title: Five Suggestions, this is not a deception
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
If you click on Privacy and terms of service when on the http://forum.imperium42.com/guidelines page, it takes you to your old site links and says “Not found”.

Read full topic

item.title: Five Suggestions, this is not a deception
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Dooku:

(website related) implement a http://throne-of-lies.com/legal/privacy.html & http://throne-of-lies.com/legal/eula.html page.

throne-of-lies.com is our old site.

https://www.ThroneOfLies.com/legal/terms.html
https://www.ThroneOfLies.com/legal/privacy.html

Dooku:

Add the ability to link your Throne of Lies account to Discord (asked Xblade about this on Discord, he said that would be cool- and probably possible due to Discord’s API).

I’d love to look into this, but this is a “bell and whistle” – this wouldn’t probably even appear in beta, probably meta release.

Read full topic
item.source: Five Suggestions, this is not a deception

item.title: Five Suggestions, this is not a deception
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
I’m not good with titles, but I guess I’ll list some suggestions that I’ve discussed on Discord.

1̶.̶ ̶T̶h̶e̶ ̶a̶b̶i̶l̶i̶t̶y̶ ̶(̶i̶n̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶f̶u̶t̶u̶r̶e̶ ̶o̶f̶ ̶c̶o̶u̶r̶s̶e̶,̶ ̶ ̶l̶i̶k̶e̶ ̶a̶f̶t̶e̶r̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶m̶a̶i̶n̶ ̶s̶t̶u̶f̶f̶ ̶a̶r̶e̶ ̶s̶q̶u̶a̶r̶e̶d̶ ̶a̶w̶a̶y̶)̶ ̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶w̶a̶l̶k̶ ̶a̶r̶o̶u̶n̶d̶ ̶r̶o̶o̶m̶s̶ ̶(̶n̶o̶t̶ ̶o̶p̶e̶n̶ ̶w̶o̶r̶l̶d̶,̶ ̶ ̶j̶u̶s̶t̶ ̶i̶n̶ ̶c̶e̶r̶t̶a̶i̶n̶ ̶r̶o̶o̶m̶s̶ ̶f̶o̶r̶ ̶f̶u̶n̶)̶,̶ ̶l̶i̶k̶e̶,̶ ̶ ̶i̶t̶ ̶l̶i̶m̶i̶t̶s̶ ̶y̶o̶u̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶o̶n̶e̶ ̶r̶o̶o̶m̶ ̶w̶h̶e̶r̶e̶ ̶e̶v̶e̶r̶y̶o̶n̶e̶ ̶i̶s̶ ̶i̶n̶,̶ ̶ ̶l̶i̶k̶e̶.̶ ̶ ̶T̶h̶e̶ ̶a̶b̶i̶l̶i̶t̶y̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶w̶a̶l̶k̶ ̶a̶r̶o̶u̶n̶d̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶t̶h̶r̶o̶n̶e̶ ̶r̶o̶o̶m̶ ̶o̶r̶ ̶s̶o̶m̶e̶t̶h̶i̶n̶g̶.̶ ̶ ̶I̶ ̶t̶h̶i̶n̶k̶ ̶@̶i̶4̶2̶-̶B̶o̶s̶l̶o̶f̶ ̶s̶a̶i̶d̶ ̶o̶n̶ ̶D̶i̶s̶c̶o̶r̶d̶ ̶t̶h̶i̶s̶ ̶s̶e̶e̶m̶s̶ ̶l̶i̶k̶e̶ ̶a̶ ̶g̶o̶o̶d̶ ̶i̶d̶e̶a̶.̶ ̶ @Unoski pointed out that this is a stretch goal. “Free, at last” @55k.

  1. (website related) implement a http://throne-of-lies.com/legal/privacy.html & http://throne-of-lies.com/legal/eula.html page.

  2. Add the ability to link your Throne of Lies account to Discord (asked Xblade about this on Discord, he said that would be cool- and probably possible due to Discord’s API).

  3. Teemo easter eggs somewhere, because teemo is the best, right?

  4. When at the table, maybe we could kind of slide a book across the table to the king? I’m not sure, I feel this could work well, like- “Only for the Kings eyes”, and then we’d slide a book across the long table with notes in it. Or something.

Anyways, those are 5 suggestions of possible features I think would be cool. I’m not the best with grammar though, and I am sorry for that.

Read full topic
